entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Smith Airport 03:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

Temperature: -25.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -28.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 24.
